poll_list.title: Convert the AKITA tokens to ETH?
poll_list.body:
Are you in favor of converting the AKITA tokens to ETH, and using this money for funding future Gitcoin Grants rounds?

---

Background: https://gitcoin.co/blog/announcement-gitcoin-community-receives-generous-gift-from-vitalik-buterin/
poll_list.author: 0xC9DC3C79EaA2028Fb1A75196fb130C7B3c4b0DCA
